reviews.review:
Amazing and reliable service! . We went through Lily's travel agency to book a 3d2n halong bay tour with Huong Hai Sealife at a reasonable price. We enjoyed the cruise, the room was in perfect condition and crew members were very friendly and welcoming.
Lily and Duong were very helpful and hospitable. Much appreciated! 🙂

Awesome services. I booked my Halong bay and Sapa trip from Lily, the quotations were very reasonable and have many options which subject to your budget.Besides, the information given was very clear and Thuy is always very responsive and helpful!Thanks both Lily and Thuy for your great help and we really enjoyed our trip in Sapa:) Please do not worry about English as both Lily andThuy speak well. I wil definately recommend this agency to everyone!

Very helpful and friendly agency!. Lily's agency was recommended to me by a friend living in Hanoi. They helped us to arrange trekking and homestay in stunning Sa Pa with the incredible, incredible Mao (a truly wonderful experience) and a trip to beautiful Halong Bay. They were always available via whatsapp and were incredibly helpful. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend them to others. Thank you Duong and the team at Lily's for all your help!

Amazingly helpful. We first visited Lily's on location in Hanoi after getting stressed out trying to arrange travel to Cat Ba Island. We walked in at 7:30 am and even though they were barely open, we were seen straight away and the team could not have been more helpful- sorted out travel arrangements for us in about 30 seconds and were polite and friendly throughout. We're now 100 miles away but still in contact by email and they continue to help with our travel logistics for amazing prices. If you're getting stressed, go see Lily!!
A very good service. My flight to Manila was found quickly, at a good price, and I was treated with kindness by the staff.

Best & reliable service!. We closed through the agency a bus to sapa, mama tour, halong bay and one day trip. Lily and her staff were so kind and patient for all of our quearions, and provided water. We took 3 days of halong bay tour and during the tour we decided to shorten the tour for 2 days. Lily took care that we'll have a seat in the bus back to Hanoi and food for lunch, and also refund a partly amount that she could achieve from the hotel.She is available all day by whatsapp.Definitely recomended!

Best advice and amazing staff. If you are wondering who to book your trips with...look no further. Lily and her team offer amazing advice and are pretty much guarantee for your happiness with the tour

Great service and friendly staffs. It's a smooth and trouble-free to have the travel experience with Lily. Lily and the staff (Thuy) are very friendly and explain everything in details of what you need to know, including places to go around in the city and their personal experience. They also give us necessary information including foods, transportations, which is a plus point for travellers like us. The easy steps for booking and efficient reply in email is very helpful. We booked a 3d2n tour to Ba Be and Ban Gioc waterfall, everything is arranged nicely and we did enjoy our stay. I highly recommend Lily and will definitely go back in the future.

Lily's Travel Agency - Excellence Service with Personal Touch Experience. My Experience with Lily's Travel Agency had being Excellence plus personal touching!Throughout my 13 days solo travelling in Vietnam as a 28 year old Male Singaporean, Lily and her team provided all the necessary guidance in detailed for all the trips I booked with them. Lily and her staff (Thuy) genuinely work their way to understand my needs/expectations and eventually worked out a travelling plan that best suits my needs and budget. Throughout my trip, Lily and Thuy never failed to respond to my calls/sms whenever I needed their assistance. Such assistance was indeed valuable and assured my trip was safe and memorable! Once again, Thank You Thuy for arranging my trips (Ha Long Bay, Sapa, Mai Chau, Hoa Binh Lake, Tam Coc and Cuc Phong National Park) with delicate care. Appreciate your heartful efforts! Xin Cảm ơn rat nhiềuOther than the Excellent Bookings, Lily's hospitality to all guests (including myself) were warm with personal touch! They served us fresh fruits/water constantly and beyond their friendliness included a personal touching experience. During one of my trips, I fell ill with fever and upon reaching back Lily's Agency, Lily's mum rubbed ginger oil on my back/forehead and served me hot ginger tea, and also guided me in ordering a packet of porridge nearby so that I could eat/rest well for the night (Thankfully I recovered next morning after taking my medication). Thanks An Kan for assisting me to order the packet of porridge! Thank You for your heartful assistance! Xin Cảm ơn rat nhiềuLily's Travel Agency offers me more than just excellence service but with personal touch with delicate efforts full of heart. I would certainly recommend to you all fellow travelers to approach them should you require any travel booking guidance or hostel accommodations! To Lily and Team: xin chào các bạn, chúc mọi người hạnh phúc và khỏe mạnh mãi mãi!Hẹn gặp lại năm sau!

Great service!. It has been a total pleasure engaging with Lily's Travel Agency, from their detailed explanations during our email correspondence, and followed by great hospitality when I was down at their office upon arriving in Hanoi. Everything went really smoothly, from the airport pickup service, to the booking of the 3D2N Halong Bay tour, as well as random food and attraction recommendations within Hanoi when I was at a loss of where to go.All in all, I highly recommend Lily's Travel Agency and will definitely go back when I visit Hanoi again in the future.

Amazing. Booking with Lily's was possibly the most smooth and easy of processes. My partner and I booked a 2N3D Ha Long bay tour through Lily's. Everything was explained thoroughly and so many options were given to us. Because they book a lot of tours each day, they take a smaller commission and offer the most competitive prices in Hanoi!

Awesomeness!!. Totally happy with the amazing the service she provided during our visit to this wonderful country. Booked all the airport transfers and Halong Bay cruise, Royal Wings, with Lily. I think we got the best possible deals. You totally got what you paid for with zero surprises. Now on the way to airport flying back to my country. Travelled with family of 7 to Hanoi, Halong Bay, Danang and Hoi An during early October.
Friendly and helpful!!. Lily is a warm, fun and knowledgeable agent. We kept in touch after the booking and she was always super helpful and nice. Highly recommended!

Best travel agency you can find!. Lily helped us with everything we needed. We booked all our rides through her. She and her staff are amazing, always help with smile and patience. They have good prices and you can completely rely on them. You're in good hands!

First class travel agency. We booked our Sapa tour through Lily and could not have been happier with the service she provided. We were warmly greeted with fruit and bottled water and quoted a very reasonable price with no haggling. Our tour was a great experience (we did the tour with Mao, not sure if there are multiple options but we loved Mao) and Lily held our larger luggage in her office while we were in Sapa. There was no heavy sales pressure or upselling like we experienced elsewhere. Highly recommended.

Efficient and Trustworhty. They were amazingly efficient! Answered my countless questions. And their rates are better than the rest. I made all my booking online and very satisfied with their service. Highly recommended.

Lily got us a great Ha Long Bay tour!. Me and my girlfriend heard about Lily's by some Australian girls we've met in Sapa. They were really happy with their Ha Long Bay trip...so they convinced us to check Lily's out. We first looked at some Ha Long Bay offers in our hotel, but also wanted to see the options at Lily's. She helped us really good and was totally honest about the different options. We ended up by booking the Gray Line Cruise for 2 days / 1 night. It was really great...we will never forget :-)Thanks Lily!

Great Tour Company. We contacted Lily's Travel from Australia to book a Halong Bay cruise after reading all of the good reviews on TripAdvisor. Lily was very quick to respond with a number of options that were substantially cheaper than booking direct with cruise lines. We settled on the Glory Legend at 120 USD per person ( including transfers ) and we were very happy with the result. Having paid a deposit online, Lily met us personally at her agency as we needed to pay the remainder of the money owed for the cruise and like others we were offered cold water and fresh fruit while there. Lily explained the itinerary in detail and provided us with her personal mobile number in case of any issues which was great. We were on the larger of the two vessels operated by Glory Legend. (same company as Pelican) The boat was very well presented, as was the food and there was a tremendous amount of it. We thoroughly enjoyed our trip to Halong Bay and Lily's Travel receives our highest recommendation. Completely trustworthy and excellent service.

Halong Bay. Lily and Thuy were soooooo welcoming, offering fruit, bottled water and of course wifi! 4 of us traveled to Halong bay and they gave us a great deal! Picked us up from our hotel, gave us lunch and dinner on the boat, had a great nights sleep the traveled to monkey island which was also amazing!! Defiantly recommend xxxx

Very friendly & great tour to Halong Bay!. Lily's Travel Agency was recommended to us by the locals we are volunteering with in Hanoi, and I can see why! The staff speak good English and go out of their way to make you feel accomodated - they gave us several bottles of water as soon as we arrived, and kept offering us fruit too. We went on the 3 days and 2 nights (second night in a bungalow) trip to Halong Bay, and it was fantastic - tour guides speak English, food is included in the price, Monkey island is awesome & Halong Bay is absolutely beautiful. It cost £100 total. We were staying a half an hour taxi ride away and they even paid for our taxi to get to Old Quarter at the start of the trip. As soon as we got back from Halong Bay we went straight back to Lily's and booked another trip for the following weekend - to Tam Coc this time.

Great agency, great tours and great people!. Went to Lilys to book our trips in Hanoi based on Tripadvisor reviews and they're all very right! We were always given water and some kind of fruit the second we walked in and they were so attentive. We sat with them for around an hour to book our tours (Halong Bay & Mai Chau) and they took time to explain everything. If you're in the old quarter in Hanoi, this is definitely the place to go!

BOOK THROUGH LILY'S!. I could not recommend Lily's more! If you're going to book tours, go here. Very accommodating and full of information. Was in the agency about an hour and we were given water and fruit while we looked at all the brochures/different tours. Our tours we had were really good and we'll worth the money we paid. We were aware there are many agencies in Hanoi that can rip you off or put you on bad tours but everything we got was very nice and legit. 100% recommend

Most accurate info in town. We were very lucky to stumble upon Lilys after looking online for a decent travel/tour agency. When we first walked in we had the pleasure of meeting Duong at the front desk. He immediately put us at ease with his honesty and willingness to let us know what would and what wouldn't work within our interests.Given his knowledge of the area he was able to confirm or deny a lot of the misinformation we had been given from other agencies. He helped setup all our transportation and tours throughout the area for a very reasonable price.The most amazing part was that he gave us a way to contact him anytime and was beyond patient when I would constantly bother him with questions regarding a bus or city we were in. He always responded extremely quickly and in a very professional manner no matter how many times I seemed to bother him. He really helped make our Vietnam trip a total success.Thanks again for everything Duong!

Helpful and Accurate. When my wife and I were looking at Halong Bay tours, we were confused by the plethora of options available and almost threw in the towel. We knew what we wanted but did not know which tour to trust and how fair the price was. I read up about Lily on some blog and decided to contact her as a last ditch effort. She was extremely responsive and honest. She understand that we wanted to get away from the crowd and that we had a budget. She suggested some options and we picked one of the options. The tour was one of the highlights of our trip to Vietnam. We had amazing food (vegetarian), a relaxed cruise itinerary and the knowledge that we got it all a good price. I would definitely recommend Lily.

Trip to Sapa. Lily was great and flexible organising our trip to Sapa. The homestay with Mao was a fantastic experience. The only bad thing was the driver who picked us up from the station was really rude and made us wait around for an hour whilst he tried to find other people to fit into his taxi. Not what we wanted at 6am after a long overnight train...

Trustworthy + Carefully curated options. I booked at their hostel and got to know about the travel agency, I am really glad I did.I used them to book Visa Services, Halong Bay Tour, City Tour & Airport transfer. Airport Pick up was not well managed but that wasn't entirely their fault as the weather messed my flight schedule. Other that this everything was great.I found their prices to be very reasonable but most importantly found their collection of tours was very good. In a country like Vietnam with so many options it can get very overwhelming. Hence, Liliy's is the go to place when you want carefully picked quality options across budgets to choose from!Overall, very happy! Thank you!

Excellent organisation - Great value for money. We were staying at the WIN Hotel in the old quarter of Hanoi and wanted to book a trip to Ha Long Bay and Cat Ba Island. Having done a lot of research we realised that it could be a bit 'hit or miss' as to whether we got a good deal or we got 'ripped off'. We read a review on a website which said that Lily's appeared to be a company that provided a good service. It transpires that Lily's is not far from the WIN Hotel, so we went there. Lily was amazing. She booked a really good quality four day trip for us at a good price (and we got a free upgrade on the boat from a cabin to a suite). Nothing was too much trouble and on one occasion when we had to contact her to make a minor adjustment to our itinerary, she responded immediately. She was so efficient, helpful, friendly and offered great value for money that we went back and booked another three day trip to Mai Chau, which was also excellent.

A diamond among agencies!!!. I moved to Hanoi in March 2016 and I have used Miss Lily’s agency on several occasions since then – to travel to Sapa, Nigh Binh, Halong Bay, to take a train to Danang or to arrange transport to Mai Chau. Each time I was very happy with the service. Miss Lily is superfriendly and superprofessional. She is a mine of all useful information and she is available 24/7 if something comes out. The best agency in Hanoi! :D

Professional, friendly and very informative. We visited Lily to book our 3 day/2 night Ha Long Bay trip and she was great in running us through different options and prices. She also found us good overnight buses and negotiated on prices!A safe and friendly bet in Hanoi

If you want to have everything planned at the best price, THIS IS THE PLACE TO GO. Lily is an amazing woman who will go to far and beyond to make sure you have the best time of your life in hanoi. Halong bay cruises, buses, tours, she has everything at the best price, the honest one! 7 stars out of 5!

Recommended!. We visited Lily's to organise our Halong Bay trip and were so pleased we did. We emailed Lily in advance and she was always quick to reply, answering our questions and showing us a range of options. In the shop Lily took the time to talk through a number of options for our budget and really listened to what we wanted. We never once felt like we were being pushed to by something. The tour we chose with Lily's help was just what we wanted and we had a great time. They also gave us lots of free water, spring rolls and fruit whilst we were choosing which was a nice extra touch!

Friendly, efficient and cheap. Lovely travel agency, not only Lily but also her mother that kept stuffing us with water melon and banana.Booked a trip to Halong bay and Sapa, both were fine even though they were a bit touristy, but there is hardly a way around that with those destinations. Thanks Lily!

Lily is the best!. I just returned home from a fantastic trip with my daughter and Lily made things so much easier in planning our trip from the States. Based on great reviews, I contacted Lily to book my overnight train, and all internal flights throughout Vietnam. Everything went off without a hitch and when we finally made it up to Hanoi, we were able to thank Lily in person for her great expertise and service. Lily can take care of all of your needs while you are in Hanoi as she booked our 2 night trip to Halong Bay, purchased our Hanoi Orchestra tickets, our hostel stay at See You at Lily's, and even scheduled a professional seamstress to come to our hostel to make my daughters dress within 24 hours. LIly is an absolute pleasure to work with extreme customer service, confidence and expertise, and it doesn't hurt that she has one of the most beautiful smiles you will ever encounter. If you are looking for someone to take care of your worries, guide you in the right direction of your trip, and who will look out for your best interests, Lily is the one you need to speak with. When we decide to return to Vietnam, she will be the first person we get in touch with. Thank you Lily and your team for making our trip the best it could be. You are the best. Craig and Zoya MartinBrea, CA.

Lily is a star! Highly recommend . We used Lily's for 2 trips including our halong bay trip. She is very honest, speaks great English, always provides free fruit and water and looked after my friend when she had tonsillitis by giving her lemon and ginger tea and asking the hostel next door to allow us early check in so she could lie down! Couldn't have asked for a better travel agency! Highly recommend :)
Great tours!. Lily is so helpful and honest! She books only the best tours and always has great advice. As soon as you walk in your feel welcomed :)

Third trip to Vietnam - would only ever use Lily. This is my third trip to Vietnam in the past three years. The first as an international volunteer living in Hanoi, the second as a backpacker travelling north to south on motorbikes and this trip with my whole family. Each time I have returned to Lily as she's gone above and beyond to give me the best service possible. She is friendly, reliable and very trustworthy. Each trip that I've made organised by her has run smoothly with no issues at all. If you want a highly reputable Travel agent, she is the one! I've recommended her to many friends who've also had similar experiences and would recommend her to anyone. Lily you're the best.

The best!. Just the best travel agency we found in east asia. Friendly, honest, really good prices, and gave us a truly class about how to sell a trip, in a way that we couldn't leave the place without get her service. Phenomenal!

Great tour to sapa. We booked two nights and three days sapa with lily and had an amazing time! The homestay was great and the trekking amazing! The price was really good compared to others and the information given by lily was very clear and spot on. We would definitely recommend you to book your trip to sapa with them!

Great help. Lily helped us organise train tickets to Dong Hoi. After the typhoon hit and our ha long bay trip was postponed by a day, we were able to call her from the boat and ask her to arrange for the train to be one day later. Lily and her working partner were both extremely helpful and smiley throughout. Throughly recommend her!! Andrew and Daniel
Very friendly, easy to use!. Great travel agency - they were very friendly, reasonably priced, and efficient. Would highly recommend!

Best travel agency in Hanoi . I don't usually write reviews. But having been to many travel agencies in the old quarter, Lily's travel agency was the best priced and also honest. Just save your time and come here if you're reading this. Free water bottle and fruit whenever you go there. All the staff were great, especially Van who served me and helped me, will not forget you guys!Oh and if do the sapa trekking, Mao is worth it.

Friendly and trustworthy travel agency!. During our stay in Hanoi we booked several tours and trips with Lily's travel agency. We were amazed by the honest and friendly service and accurate advice. We recommend Lily's travel agency to all our friends going to Vietnam!

Best service and agency in Hanoi. Lily gave us the best service and hospitality throughout our two weeks trip in Vietnam! We had a terrible experience with our hostel and was not allowed to go on the cruise that we initially wanted to book! Thank God for Lily! She arranged another cruise for us and it was amazing! Best price with best service! We were served with tonnes of fruits and water while we were there. Besides Lily, everyone else there was really friendly and helpful too! Was a pity that Lily's hostel was fully booked, their room looked amazing! They offered us another room at another hotel and also a discounted rate of taxi to airport! Lily and her crew was just AMAZING!

Miss Ly is pure gold . Miss Ly is the best I have found in Vietnam. Every time I need some travel arrangements or visas I go straight to miss Ly. I have been using her for 5 years now. I simply send her an email and it happens. She is also very good at helping me choose the best travel arrangements. Can't rate her high enough. She is also very careful to ensure the tours she recommends are good quality. She is open and honest if you ask her about a tour she is not familiar with and will do her best to meet all your needs.

Best service. I booked my Ha Long Bay cruise through them. the price was much cheaper than any travel agents in hanoi. She has always delivered what was promised although i didn't received an invoice via email she even booked my request via whatsapp. Don't worry if you solo traveler, lily has friendly,helpful and honest staff. Lily always in her phone and whatsapp. I tottaly recomended them for your trip in Hanoi

Friendly and Honest Agency. Lily just sold us the best cruise to Halong Bay! We stumbled in the place by accident and were sold in the first 5 minutes. Lily is a really friendly person and super honest about what she has to offer to her clients. While there talking about our plans for Halong Bay she provided some water and fruits so we could relax. We booked a wonderful 2 days, 1 night trip for a really good price. The whole experience was so good that in 3 days we already referred the agency for 6 friends. So, if you are looking for the best trips, with good prices and truly honest advice you should definitely check Lily's Agency. Bonus: her son showed us all the best cafés and local food restaurants of Hanoi.

Best agency in Hanoi. We stopped in Lily's Agency because suggested by a friend and we immediately felt at home. Lily, Phan and the other girls of the agency were incredibly nice, giving us loads of informations without pushing us to book anything. They fed us with a refreshing watermelon (thank you Lily, I love watermelon :)) and saved us from the terrible heat with plenty of water bottles.We ended up to book a two days tour in Halong Bay and a three days trekking in Sa Pa.The Halong bay tour was exactly what we had been told by Lily's, a great cruise through the fabulous descending dragons bay with a lot of different activities, but was the Sa Pa tour that left us speechless. Our guides were Mao and her sister Sue, from the Black Hmong tribe. I really have no words to describe how great this experience was for me and how deeply I felt connected to their land, their culture and their living. I wish I could have spent with them more than just three days. Probably the best experience in over one year of traveling. Thank you Lily and Phan for this amazing opportunity, I will never be able to thank you enough. Say hi to Sue and Mao for me as you have the chance :)
Halong Bay and Sapa tours. Best Sapa tour ever! Two nights in an home stay far from the touristic routes with very nice and prepared guides (Sue and Mao)! I recommend it!

Great Travel Booker. My boyfriend and I used Lily to help us book our 3 day 2 night boat trip in Halong Bay as well as our 3 days trekking and 2 night homestay in Sapa and the overnight train to and from Sapa. I was a bit worried as I did all of my booking online and so I was just going off of the reviews here on trip advisor. I must say though that everything was great with Lily. She was quick to respond to emails and she gave me a bunch of different options in different price ranges for Halong Bay and Sapa. The boat we stayed on was great in a wonderful room and she got us an amazing deal on the price. Our trekking in Sapa was one of our highlights as the home stays were great and the trekking was exhausting but beautiful. I would highly recommend Lily and if I ever go back to Vietnam I'll be using her again!

Dedicated and high quality service. There are thousands of different tours around Hanoi which makes it an absolute headache to navigate and choose. It made a tremendous difference that Lily explained and detailed her tours with a high degree of transparency. I suppose the agency prioritises good reviews and recommendations over scale. We booked a Ha Long Bay cruise on Silversea Cruise, and a 2D1N Sapa trekking and home-stay tour through Lily. Both tours went pretty smoothly - it may be good to note that Lily has direct contacts with the many different parties involved which makes troubleshooting much easier. Quality of tours were also reliable for their price range. I found out from a crew member on the cruise that Lily herself goes onto the cruise to audit its standards. Definitely recommended for anyone travelling to Hanoi! Cheers :)

Best travel agent so far!. Lily and her crew were amazing in helping set up our trips in and around Hanoi. We booked several trips including Ha Long Bay, bus to Sa Sa and our bus to Phong Nha. She was very honest(which can be hard to find) and everything she explained to us about our travels were spot on.Our night bus got back to Hanoi from Sa Pa at 3am. She let us sleep on her bean bags next door at their hostel until we got picked up for Ha Long Bay.Tell her what your budget is and she can give you all the options possible.They even offered us fruit and bottled water everytime we came in!Thank you so much for your help and we'll be recommending you to anyone who is heading to Hanoi.

Best Travel Agency in Hanoi. We wanted to do halong bay tours but our hostel gave us a rather expensive price. And our friend suggest us to try Lily's Travel Agency. We found out that for the same tour(fantasea) they have cheaper price compare to the hostel.so we booked with them. Our hostel found out about the price we paid and they make a fuss about it with the company providing the service. Miss Thuy(lily's agent) called us telling we're not accepted in Fantasea because of that. To make story short, Lily's Agent upgraded us into a better cruise. We were so glad and thankful for this. Everything Thuy told us about the cruise was true, the room, meals,itineary and everything was exactly as expected. Our tour guide, Mr. Kim is also an excellent tour guide, very informative and speaks good english.Through this all, we can see their honesty and profesionalism in dealing with their clients and business. And yes, they keep contact with us to make sure everything is perfect even after the tour. This is exceptional. No other tour agents in my 1.5years of travels has ever done that. Kudos to the team at Lily's Travel Agency.

Booked mai chau and ha long bay. Lily and Thuy were really friendly and English speaking. They spoke English pretty fluently too. The tours were well explained and with no hidden costs or anything nonsense were added. They're genuinely one of the best or the best in Old Quarters. Couldn't ask for more, borrowed a helmet for a bike from them too! They never hesitated!

Honest advice, no pressure and exceptional after sales service. We were overwhelmed by the number of different travel agencies in Hanoi (including a bit of pressure to book through our guesthouse) and didn't know where to go. We realised quite quickly that despite the million travel agencies, they all book through the same small number of tour operators, for similar prices. Therefore how you should assess travel agencies is the honesty of the advice you're getting and whether you think you can count on them to help you if (or when!) things go wrong. You get both of these with Lily's. We went into Lily's numerous times to book a Sapa tour, a Halong Bay tour and an open bus ticket. Each time we were greeted with huge smiles, more bottles of water than we could carry, fruit and soy beans. At no point did we feel any pressure to buy from here (and we frequently left without booking to discuss which tour we wanted as we wandered around the Old Quarter). We just got good honest advice about the different tours and prices.What particularly makes Lily stand out is her post sales service. We had her whatsapp number and was told we could contact her 'any time of the day or night' for assistance. We needed to do this a few times with the open bus ticket, mainly due to the terrible communication abilities of the bus drivers (not Lily's fault!). Each time Lily was able to answer our questions and sort out our issues. The chances of having at least one issue on the open bus tour are high, and having someone you can contact is very comforting. If you are booking the Sapa tour, make sure you ask for Mao as a guide. She is the most knowledgeable, funny and lovely guide that you could ask for. We enjoyed every minute of our 3 day 2 night trek. She took us on some great routes through the rice fields and around the villages with some very funny and interesting stories. Trekking itself was not too difficult. You will absolutely not go hungry, we ate some amazing home cooked food and it just kept coming! You may also drink more rice wine than you planned....If booking Halong Bay tour we went through Lemon Cruises. Paid a bit more than the other options, but we didn't want a 'party boat', we wanted two nights on a boat giving us one full day on the water and we went a different route to the east of the main Halong Bay Area which was a lot quieter. I can honestly say that the boat was exactly how it looked in the brochures. It was clean, comfortable and the shower was one of the best we had had while travelling. Hot rain shower. Can't fault them on anything. Know that as it takes 4 hours to get to Halong Bay from Hanoi, even the 2 day 1 night option is only just about 24 hours on the boat itself.Lily mentioned that she was trying to set up agencies elsewhere in Vietnam. I hope she does - it would help increase the customer service everywhere!

Halong Bay 2 Days Tour. Lily,s Travel Agency is a reliable, trustworthy agency. First, when I asked the different options to go to a halong bay cruise she explained me all the details in function of my budget. You can rely on her, she really says the truth and try to do her best. She and her team are really nice and they take care about their custumers. They are trying to do their best for you to be satisfyed. So great service with very very very nice people.

First Class Service! "Cheap, Medium, Good! LOL!" THANK YOU LILY!. We had gone to several agencies to compare prices but once we heard abt Lily, we definately had to find her & thank heavens we did!Everything amazing you've heard or read abt her is true! It was very hot & she kindly forced watermelons & btls of water to us while explaining patiently the different type of tours we cld take. We were looking at Halong Bay & she honestly explained to us the differences with the prices & what you would be getting. Her honesty was incredibly refreshing & we got great deals for our budget.Definately a MUST to get her advice on anything & everything in Vietnam. She even personally showed us rooms in her new hotel/hostel, which we wouldve booked if we hadnt already had arrangments.

Great service . We booked our Sapa trip and Halong bay trip with Lily and were completely delighted. The service is outstanding. Lily offered us several options and let us choose. Not pushing us anywhere. Prices are very reasonable as she is keeping lower commission than other agencies. We chose 3 days 2 nights tour in Sapa. We were picked up at bus station in Sapa by Su and walked to homestay on the other side of hills. Mattresses in homestay were very comfortable and the food was delicious. In the evening Mao treated us with a lot of "happy water". The tracks are very interesting as you are walking through rice fields and meeting locals. The best thing was that we met only 1 group of tourist(4 persons) in whole day. All guides spoke sufficient English and were very helpful. I must say that this trip was highlight of our stay in Vietnam and thanks to Lily everything was well organised.

Please book Sapa from here!. We had an amazing time in Sapa with Mao and Sue. Lily's organization was amazing and I organized Sapa all through email which was great! She gave me her personal number which was reassuring. We had such a good time that we also arranged halong bay through her. Her team are so so kind as well!

Excellent deals and services. The excellent tour agency in hanoi...Very honest,such a nice and helpful agencyStaff speak excellent english.. I really enjoyed my trips to hanoi 3 days halong bay,mai chou,hou lu tam coc.. highly recommendAwesome travel company... super super lily's travel agency thank you...!!!

Lovely tour agency. Lily and her staff were absolutly amazing organising our halong tour. Everything ran smoothly on the tour and all the staff were lovely. Lily was very nice and spoke english very well. Would highly recommend Lilys travel agency to everybody.

Incredible two-day Sapa trek. Booked a 3N/2D Sapa trek with Lily, and it was definitely a trip highlight! Our small group was led by the awesome Jane, who took us through a gorgeous 5-6 hours of hiking to reach Mao's homestay in her Black Hmong village. Mao was a great host, incredibly warm and generous. And hilarious! Mao then led us back down to Sapa on the second day, where we said our sad goodbyes before making our way to the comfortable train. Thank you Jane, Mao, and Lily for an unforgettable experience!

Bad transfer and broken promises. We used Lily's Travel Agency to book our airport transfer, whatever you do don't use this agency or you'll miss your flight!! It was an early morning flight and we'd been waiting nearly an hour for our pick up to arrive, I called Lily and she said the pick up was on it's way, but actually it wasn't!! Turns out the driver had forgotten to pick us up and called our hotel after receiving a call from Lily to arrange another driver! The driver who showed up was awful shouting at us, pulled over on the side of the road for ages while they switched drivers! We were so lucky to have not missed our flight when check in was closing when we eventually arrived! Lily had offered us a refund, this was 2 months ago now and after a lot of chasing she has still not refunded us our money, don't promise your customers something if you're not going to do it!

2 day Trip with 1 night homestay sapa . We booked our first Trip at lily's.She was a recommended from other travelers and we thanks a lot for this.Lily and the Team is great, so friendly and helpful. She makes a lot things possible if you want and give you so much recommends.We had the Trip at sapa at the Black monghs with mao. It was an amazing Trip with a lot of Information about their culture and the landscape.Thank you lily !

Highly Recommended tour agency. We booked a tour with Lily to go to HaLong bay. She took the time to explain everything and did not pressure us at all, and in the end we booked an option that was good and affordable with a very good company (Fantasea). We enjoyed ourselves very much. Lily was professional.

Book any North Vietnam tours here! . Wow - we booked a 3 day 2 nights trekking tour in sapa with lily. It was amazing! We stayed at mao's homestay and this was the best part of our Vietnam trip, such a funny and authentic host. Really cozy too, on a kind of mini farm. The other tour was a cruise on ha long bay with fantasea. Definitely recommend this too. Lily's is extremely helpful and also you get exactly what you are expecting, it is a very honest travel agent. I would definitely recommend to book with her - we had some bad experiences at other places!

Best travel agency. My girlfriend and I booked a two day one night trip to halong bay and a three day two night trekking trip in sapa with lilys. They were completely honest about what to expect on our trips and truly helpful. When we needed to change the time we would return on the bus she organised it for us and really genuinely concerned that we enjoyed our trip and I think that is reflected in the people she works with as her guides. We really enjoyed both trips and our guides were Toan for Halong bay and the kind and generous Mao in whose house we stayed in a Hmong village. Would absolutely recommend lilys to anyone and staying with Mao was one of the best experiences of our whole trip. We love Mao!!!

Sapa & Halong Bay. We booked trips to Sapa and Halong bay with the agency. Their service was very friendly and they explained all options our budget and time frame allowed (we talked to them via email and it worked great but going in there and having a conversation was even better and they offered to keep our excess luggage for us during the trips). We ended up booking two trips that fit us perfectly and had a great time at a very good price. We took the "less touristic" tour in Sapa which was really that: not many other tourists, a knowledgable guide from the local tribe, awesome local food and a rustic (not to say basic) home stay. We booked a trip to Halong bay with Fantasea cruise which was also very nice, well planned and great for what we wanted. It was also great that we could reach the agency via telephone and whatsapp at all times and they helped to calm us as our pick up was late. The only things that could be improved are very insignificant but overall the experience we had with the agency was so good that we feel this could make it perfect: it would be helpful to have a printed itinerary of what happens when and where you're supposed to be picked up (and by whom) and where you're staying would be great for the Sapa trip (we ended up waiting at the bus stop in Sapa for our guide for a while which wasn't bad but we didn't know anything about the next steps so we felt lost until we got the chance to call the agency). And also, the Sapa trip included "pick up from the hotel" which turned out to be a guy on a scooter. We had to run crisscross through the city following the guy while he picked up more people until we stopped very close to where we stayed again to be put into a minivan made for 15 people; only we were 20 people plus luggage. We only drove like that for a very short while and walking shouldn't be a problem for someone who books trekking in Sapa but it just wasn't the best "hotel pick up" experience.But again, apart from these minor issues, we had a great experience booking with the agency and a lot of fun on our trips. Thank you, Lily's!
Lilys agency . Lily is amazing and very helpful!!! Also her guest house is very clean smells good and comfortable!! Very recommanded egency!!!!

A refund and very impressive service anyway. They gave us no trouble giving our money back. We had a difficult experience in our cruise in Halong Bay - in fact we cut short our trip because we got sick on the boat from the food (Legacy Cruise). We came back a day early. We were so grateful Lily's Travel Agency were our booking agency. They were super friendly and very considerate about everything we had a problem with and went above and beyond to make sure we were doing well. We had forgotten our laundry in the hotel and they picked it up for us. They even send us extra bottles of cold water on the boat to make sure we had enough water (cruise ship charges for water)!!! They even took care of the sunglasses our friends forgot on the bus! Truly we were blessing the moment we discovered them. :) We cannot imagine a better service! we highly recommend them.

personalized, friendly and reasonable rates. We stepped into Lily's Travel Agency on our recent trip to Vietnam based on reviews from Trip Advisor. I had communicated via email with Lily but could not figure out how to book online, so, I thought it would be best to meet her. Glad I did, she was very sweet and listened to the type of tours we were interested in and set us up on two tours, one to Halong Bay for the day, and the other to grottoes. Both were excellent, but, I will say the lunch stop for the grottoes was disappointing. I loved the guide (sorry I forgot her name), but I think we got there toward the end of their lunch serving and the food looked picked over and not particularly pleasing. I ate a bit, but, other than that, the trips were great.

Very good service!!! Ótimo serviço!!. Lily and all staff were fantastic! Very friendly and professional!! We went to the travel agency a few times and they always were very nice! Always helping us and giving us food and water!! :)
We booked two trips with them (Sapa and Halong Bay), which were great too!
Thanks for all!

Clarity and Sanity in a Sea of Confusion (great for vegetarians). My friend and I were shopping around for Ha Long bay tours. The market is insane and there are literally hundreds of vendors that don't even know what they are selling. What I loved about Lily's Agency was she was very clear about the different price tiers that they offered and how the specific trips were different from each other. She was also transparent about which parts of the trip were for sure going to happen and which were tentative depending on weather conditions (rather than other agencies, which promised the moon and back and made me very skeptical). My friend and I picked the middle price tier for a great price and we had a great tour, no complaints. Chung (from Fantasea) was our guide he was great, we got to kayak through caves, see the "surprise cave", go squid-fishing at night, and learned how to make spring rolls. As a vegetarian I was also very concerned I wouldn't have good food to eat for two days, but Chung and Fantasea arranged for plenty of vegetarian food (more than I could eat and a variety) at each meal. Would book again!

Nice trip, but could be better. We booked the 2-night trip to Sa Pa via Lily's Hostel. We were told to be in a group of max. 10 peoples. At the end we were 12, and at Mao's place even 16. That was not exactly the experience that we expected. The homestay is very basic. Since we were 16 guests it did not really felt like a homestay. And in my opinion, when they want to have so many guests at once, there should be more than one toilet and one shower. Especially at these prices. So they are better off keeping it small. Also the drinks are overpriced. 0,5l water for 10000 is too much for what you pay for a bed. The hikes were very nice, with great views and good guides. So it was really sad to see that two of the 3 guides actually seemed to be no guides but just wanted to sell stuff at the end of the trip. If they show their offer and ask if we want to buy anything - that is totally ok. But they surrounded us and didn't stopped asking us to buy something, so it felt very awkward and bad to say no for the 20th time, sitting at your destination and trying to relax from the trip. That is exactly what you do not expect when booking a not-so-cheap all inclusive tour. I would have loved to give a good tip instead.Mao is a good and fun person and the overall experience was still great, also because we were very lucky with our nice group and also with the weather.

Great service. I booked multiple trips with Lily's - Ha Long Bay, Sa Pa, Fan Si Pan.. all of them were great. All of the arrangements were as discussed, and Lily always available for any changes during the trip - which happened with some of those I was traveling with. Nothing was too much trouble.

Good arrangements and helpful staff.. I and my Singaporean friends booked a tour with Lily's travel. We're mainly students so we booked a budget tour to Ha Long Bay for 2 days 1 night. Lily, was really helpful and nice to us. Always smile, good patience and explained clearly to us every thing about the tour even we just booked a budget tour with her. At that time, we were lack of budget so we thought a budget tour was OK. But actually we regretted about it. You should never book a budget tour. The tour guide is rude and the food is good but not enough serving for all of us. Ha Long bay is beautiful. Lily was really nice. Trust me, you will want to book a tour with this lady. She is the first person I want to contact if I want to travel in Vietnam. Thank you Lily!
Good arrangement. If you looking for flexible and helping agent, Lily's travel is recommended. They can arrange the tour base on what we need.

Lily's is amazing!. I was recommended by a friend to visit Lily for all my trip needs and I'm so happy I did! From the moment I walked in to enquire I was taken care of. Lily and one of her assistants gave us water and fed us fruit as they went through all our options with us, they speak excellent English and were very honest about what you get within each price range. We explained we only have 15 days with our visa exemption and Lily recommended which packages would suit us for the trips we want to do in the limited time we have and even went through day by day on the calendar how we might want to spend the rest of our days heading south through Vietnam until the day we leave :) very helpful.We booked a mid range priced Halong Bay trip which was excellent, pick up and drop of right back to the agency (which was the same road we were staying) and also a 2 day Sapa trek (also with pick up) which included one night bus stay and a home stay. Mao was an amazing host, completely hilarious and so kind and accommodating. We ate until I genuinely thought I might burst and then out came the happy water...I would 100% ask for her, her and her family are wonderful!Lily enquired prices and means to getting to our next destination of Hoi An for us too and after a few phone calls we decided to get the night bus and flights were too expensive.I would recommend anyone wanting any information regarding trips, transport or any information at all really, to pay Lily a visit. They will give honest advice and information and at no point do you ever feel obliged to agree to anything, you can come and go and compare as you please :) thanks for making our trip amazing!

Great experience. I loved my experience at Lily´s Agency, she was brilliant and the rest of the staff working there were amazing too. I really felt they care about me having a good experience, they were genuinely helpful. I would definitely recommend this place to book tours!

"Excellent travel agent". I found this travel agent on trip advisor and would certainly use them again if I was ever in Vietnam. Their communication was perfect. I never met the agent and all correspondence was via email. We booked our Halong Bay Cruise through them. They never tried to push one particular tour company which was nice. The price was so much cheaper than I could get in Australia. The pickup from our hotel was perfect and when the hotel asked the price of our tour they mentioned it was a good price. A++ company - will totally recommend again.

Must book with Lily's!. A friend and I have been traveling for 10weeks now and thought Lily's might be like any other travel agent. We were lured in by Lily's friendly face but didn't want to commit to anything too soon. She was fine about us just exploring options and was happy providing us with prices to think about with no pressured selling. She provided us with snacks and water as she rang companies for our Halong Bay tour. We went away and thought about it before returning the next day to book with other members of her staff who also couldn't do enough for us. They undercut any other prices we got and were honest with us about the different boats and buses to Hue available. We booked both with them there and then and everything else ran smoothly. Tours were as described and pick up from Lily's both times were so easy. Great staff who I'd recommend to any travellers to get an honest deal.

Great customer service. Lily is all about customer service - that much is obvious by all of the reviews on here and I can add to them! We started with a tour to Sapa, which ended up being one of the highlights of my Vietnam trip... The three day two night tour took us there by Hung Thanh sleeper bus - very good quality, even if the members of this company can be very rude and shouty - you seem to get that on every bus in Vietnam! We had three days of trekking, walking, interacting with the Black Hmong people in the village and stayed with the amazing Mao and her family. Such a good experience and well worth the money - which wasn't as much as other companies were selling tours for anyway! Our second two night three day trip we (6 of us) booked whilst in Sapa to Halong Bay... Now this didn't exactly go as planned but that could be partly our fault for booking over the phone - we ended up on a boat called Ha Long Party Cruises after definitely not wanting a party boat or anything similar to the Castaways tour... We were told that there were two different tours to Ha Long Bay, one for young people with happy hours and one for older people, but that they were largely the same. We booked the younger person tour. I would say that the majority of the people on the party boat were just young people not necessarily looking for a massive party, but the whole tour was geared up around getting everyone wasted on the buy 4 get one free happy hour by the host... And unless you state that you want to see the features of Ha Long bay that you see in the brochures, and have all of items on the itinerary, you might not get them! Saying all of that, we ended up having a good time nonetheless and decided to make the trip our own (and not about the party boat and arranged drinking games), and had a few beers and met some cool people. The Freedom island is really cool to chill out on though...the whole trip would have been that much better if you weren't forced into the drinking. But as I mentioned before, it is probably our fault for not getting all of the information and booking the party tour, not Lily's! The last point is regarding the amazing service of Lily. We were at the bus station in Sapa where the bus manager for Hung Thanh wouldn't let us get onto the bus, because we apparently didn't have a booking, when I'm sure that we did as Lily had booked it for us. The manager was very shouty insisting he had no space on his bus for us, so we rang Lily. Lily then rang the manager straight away and we were all of a sudden allowed onto the bus, no problems. Ive no idea what she did but the response time was amazing, avoiding a bad situation for us. We (three of us) also booked a Hung Thanh open bus ticket through Lily to travel south with 7 stops. This turned out to only be Hung Thanh bus for 1/7 of the buses and the only one with a toilet.., after choosing Hung Thanh and paying extra for their nice buses we were a bit frustrated, however Lily was very apologetic as we had booked this through her even though it probably wasn't her fault as she thought that Hung Thanh's partners further down the country were reliable and of the same standard. As we weren't happy, Lily refunded us some of the money that we paid for the better bus, which she definitely didn't have to do, I think this was a good show of her amazing customer service and I was very grateful for this! Overall I'd definitely recommend Lily as your travel agent for Vietnam, she is a very nice person, very professional and always willing to help!

This is the best and most reliable travel agency in Hanoi. I have booked many trips through Lily's and she has always delivered what was promised. She is really friendly, helpful and honest. If you are visiting Hanoi and wan't to do Halong bay trips etc. I totally recommend her.

Perfect in any case. We chose Lily's because of the good reviews. We booked our trip to Sa Pa (which was the highlight of our 3 weeks trip) and Halong Bay as well as the Bus Tickets. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. Gave us a good feeling on our first asian journey. They always offered water and food, more than we could eat or drink while waiting for the bus. Would always go back again!

Great Experience!. We booked a Homestay with Mao in Sapa and couldn't have been happier. We were debating which tour would fit our budget, and got all of the information we were looking for without any pressure from the wonderful staff at Lily's. The Homestay with Mao was excellent, an experience I'll never forget. Everyone else on the tour was happy with it too. Definitely book your Sapa tour here...or wherever else you're going!
Great, fast service. Lily and co. went out of their way to give us advice, without pressuring us into a purchase. Her advice was useful and she operates ethically.

The best travel agent in Hanoi. We came to see Lily on our first day (out of almost two weeks) in Hanoi to get some information about Halong bay tour. Beside the fact that she gave us the best price, she was super nice to us and told us just everything we need to know about what we need to do and what to see while we are in Hanoi. People may say that travel agents are nice only before they close the deal but it is not the case here. Lily was in touch with us on Whatsapp making sure thay our trip is going well and that we have everything that we need. I think I dont need to mention that we booked everything that we did in Hanoi at Lily's

Excellent service. Lily provides a great service, always patient and with a big smile! She helped us with all we could think of, and more. She helped us book hotels, buses, tours, and also gave recommandations for places to eat and things to do, and all so we can have the beat stay in Hanoi! Her prices are the chiepest we could find in the city. Lily is always available in her phone and whatsapp and helped us also when we were at Sapa and Halong bay. I recommand everyone to use her services!

Efficiency and honesty to the max. I travelled from South Africa with a group of 2 friends to vietnam for 8 days. I read about Lily's Travel agency on the below forum. I established communication with Lily via email. I had received quotations from other hanoi travel agencies. Lily's was by far the cheapest. I had specific itenerary and hotels that I had chosen which Lily included. What astounded me was the degree of honesty and transparency of Lily. Her quotes had itemised billing which in most cases was cheaper than the cheapest internet deal I could secure for each item. I bothered her with over 71 emails which were responded to with a turn around time of no longer than 48 hours. I was further surprised by the fact that Lily did not require full payment on confirmation of the tour. I had to make a small fractional deposit. The other amazing thing was that she never pressurized you into taking any option of her tours.On arrival in hanoi transfer was awaiting with name board. I had seemless check in. At 2 of the 3 hotels I had requested I received a much appreciated upgrade. On arrival in hanoi I made the remainder of payment transfer in cash US dollars. Not only did Lily further explain itinerary and made amendments that were cost and logistically optimal, she also exchanged USD to dong at the most competitive rate I could find.My Halong Bay cruise and transfers, plus overnight sleeper train were exactly what I requested and at a phenomenal price. When a domestic flight had a change of time (brought forward by 7 hours), Lily went to extensive lengths to contact and notify me of this. Be aware that this is a frequent occurrence with domestic flights in Vietnam. One of our tours in hoi an was cancelled due to inclement weather. Lily made us aware of this and refunded the full amount in cash from the hotel reception we stayed at. Another tour was not logistically possible in hue due to the late arrival of our train. Lily gave all the options including a private tour which was pricey. She went on to recommend we take our own non organised tour as all sites in hue were easily reachable. This is a rarity wit tour operators, who often pressurize you take options where they receive commissions. Lily is always available and furnishes you with her whatsapp number which provides an easy means of communication for clarifying arrangements pick up times etc.You can always be guaranteed to receive a warm reception from Lily and her team. They go above and beyond their line of duty. They stored our large luggage on 2 occasions and always offered mineral water and peanuts whenever we passed by the agency. Also for a transfer not included, one of the staff members manged to signal a taxi and explain our destination in vietnamese. I am not sure the name of Lily's assistant who was on night duty on 29 March. She was very friendly and spoke excellent English and stayed passed closing time while we waited for our transfer.The only constructive criticism I would have to offer is that on itineraries Lily should provide a detailed description of sites visited on day tours and the day's schedule for OCD people like myself who are major planners and would not like to duplicate visiting sites included on the subsequent days tours during free time in the city,In conclusion, I have taken many 5 star organised customized holiday tours, Lily's Travel far exceeds any other tour operator I have used. Do not be detracted and think that Lily can only organise short excursions or day trips for the "backpacker type". They are phenomenal at organising full itineraries with internal transfers, 4 star accommodation and city tours.Its a pity tripadvisor has a maximum of 5 stars. Lily's travel deserves 7 stars for price and efficiency.

Fair prices, excellent English and incredible your. If you are reading this it probably means you are trying to find a reputable and fair travel agency Hanoi. Look no further and do not be skeptical of the other stellar reviews of Lily's. They are totally accurate. In the land of scams, Lily's agency is a true gem. The women working with Lily speak excellent English, they are kind and go above and beyond to help you choose your adventure at a fair price. If you are booking with Lily's I must insist that you do Sapa trekking. As specially to be with Mao. Mao leads a homestay in her H'mong village. The experience was one of the most special things I have ever done in my life. Search online for Mao and you will find she has admirers all of the globe. Mao's homestay is the best by a long shot. Her house is well equip for guests and on her walls are drawings and photos from her many guests. She takes you hiking far into the mountains to see hidden views and villages. The food she cooks was the best I've had in Vietnam. You stay up late chatting with her and sipping rice wine that she calls happy water. By the end of the trip you will not want to leave her! I recommend you spend two nights with Mao to take advantage of the long hike options. Do the sleeper bus instead of the train, which is hear is so rocky you can't even sleep. The bus is faster and cheaper and you make less connections- lily will tell you that also.

Lily you are great! . We booked through lilys for a sapa tour and she was fantastic. Super helpful and friendly in the shop and was completely honest with pricing up the tours and working out what was best for us. We booked to stay with Mao and she was the funniest nicest little tribes lady ever. I would highly recommend booking through lilys and if so ask for Mao! !

the best place to book trips. Lily's was a great find, thanks to Trip Advisor. You don't need to waste time looking for the best deal for day trips - just go see Lily. We gave her vague ideas what we were looking for in a Halong Bay trip and she came up with the best tour and at a super discounted price (Glory Legend). The trip was exactly what we were wanting and had a fabulous time. Go see Lily to book your adventures, you won't be disappointed!

Amazing lady and service. I booked my Halong Bay, Sapa Tour and Open Bus ticket with Lily and her team. Lily is fantastic, I felt that I could absolutely 100% trust every recommendation she made and I had such an amazing time on each of the activities she planned.Lily is genuinely interested in you having the best time in Vietnam and you should definitely visit her in Hanoi to grantee an amazing time!

Best travel agency!. My friend told me about Lily's Travel Agency and he was very enthusiastic. When I got at the agency I felt welcome right away. I was offered tea and fruit and Lily told me everything about the trips she could arrange for me without being pushy.I've booked my trip to Halong Bay, Sapa and my open bus ticket for Vietnam at Lily's Travel Agency and it was all perfectly arranged. Good quality for a decent price. I would recommand all travelers to book their trips at this place!

Best Agency in Ha Noi!. First of all, I would like to thanks Lily for organizing our trip when we were there. For those who doesn't want to get ripped of when booking tours in Ha Noi, DO NOT hesitate to choose Lily, I can guarantee she is the best. I was in Ha Noi for 3 nights and booked the tour with Lily. She gave us the options to choose and told us the difference between the price. Do not hesitate to choose the most expensive one as it is just $10 - $15 difference and you will get really good tour. During our 1st day to Ha Long Bay, there was only 18 pax in total and 2nd day to Tam Coc, it was just a small group with only 14 pax. Our Tour Guide was excellent, he was really helpful and funny. The last day we went to Sapa, even though the trip was tiring but we really enjoyed it. We stayed in the homestay which hosted by Mao, a funny H'mong lady. Please send my regards to Mao!!!

Made our visit to Northern Vietnam work out perfectly!. Our group booked two tours through Lily's Travel Agency while staying in Hanoi, and couldn't be happier with what we got! We booked a three day tour of Halong Bay, and a 1 day tour of Bai Dinh Pagoda/Trang An, and also arranged airport transfer when leaving town. We were incredibly happy with the quality of both tours. We had shopped around a bit and found the price that Lily offered to be the best around! Lily and the people that work for her travel agency are the nicest people we met in Vietnam! Everyone there spoke great English and is very friendly which made it very easy to communicate. They only helped us book what we were interested in, and did not try to push anything extra on us. Since we had checked out of our hotel for the last day trip, Lily held our bags for us at her shop for free. Since we had a flight to catch, she worked with the the tour operator to guarantee we would arrive back in Hanoi in time to catch our flight. She also gave us free water and vietnamese fruits to try while we waited. Altogether very honest, trustworthy, and a pleasure to work with.
Thank You So Much. Very genuine, great pricing & informative. She will always try to attend all your queries. Highly recommended.

Honesty + home welcoming to Hanoi/Halong visit. Feb 27 to Mar 05,2016 we visited Hanoi,Halong Bat cruise + Catba Island. All arranged by Lily's Travel via email. All perfectly arranged with no disputes no hot pushing to take her suggestions. Always give options cheap, medium & high price rating for me to pick. All land connections & airport pickup & drop off done within time. I had a food poisoning one evening. Stuart suggest that we visit a foreign doctors based clinic & accompanied us to the taxi to tell driver where we're to go which clinic. Clinic doctor put me on saline drip & we returned to Lily's hostel. her hostel kitchen staff cooked me a piping hot corn porride with ginger to relieved my empty tummy & allows me to sleep well after. This was done without my askings! Bet u this service will not be obtained from another hotel! Our full day land tour was cancelled due to my food posioning. Lily's tour refunded back our full booking amount paid without question asked. Our departure was well taken care due to my recovery & staff arranged our airport transport & accompanied us with our bags to the van for timely depature. A very homely service provided by Lily's travel. Highly recommended for guests visiting Vietnam as her recommmendations & suggestions is far superior I have encountered.

We love Van and Lily!!!!!. We absolutely recommend this agency because the services are really good and honest, but furthermore, the girl that arranged everything for us, Van, is the cutest and more professional agent you will ever find...., so thanks for everything Van!!

trying to book a trip to vietnam & cambodia 27 days trip .. based on trip adviser reviews we called lilys travel & sent her our itinerary & talk to her few times .never hard fro her & got about our trip. her customer service was also not good . if she cant give you good service now .than what will you do when in vietnam.

Honesy. Honesty is a scarce thing in the Vietnamese tourist industry, but there is so much of it here, which is why they are so successful. It's a bonus that they are the most lovely people. We booked several transport through them plus a $65 overnight ha long bay tour, which was being sold at all other places we went as $95 with exactly the same tour company.

Lily's Tours was Amazing. Lily come recommended through a friend and did not disappoint at all. Served me fruit and bottled water when I entered and was very friendly and polite. I booked a tour to Sapa, Halong Bay and an Open Bus ticket with extreme ease and very very reasonable prices. Lily passed on her phone number so that she could be contacted regarding any issues and when I called at 6am with a problem she answered and quickly resolved it - this is top service!!! and cannot recommend highly enough. The hiking in Sapa organised through Lily was an exclusive relationship with an amazing family who welcomed you into their home while also offering amazing and flexible hiking routes not frequented by other tourists. If you're going to book a hike in Sapa, book this one!!!

The right person to book with in Hanoi. We went to Lily because she was recommended on tripadvisor. She really filled our expectations :) as we walked in, she gave us fruit and water. We booked halong bay and an open bus ticket with her. She brought such great hospitality and very fair and reasonable prices. She even followed up with us to make sure we enjoyed her services. We highly recommend going to her office if you want to book something from Hanoi. Happy travels!

Lily's amazing. Friendliest person in Hanoi! She will not sell you any dodgy stuff or any Tour she would not do herself. Booked a 2 Day Tour to the Bay and all others actually paid more than I did. She even gave me her personal number for emergencies!Truly the best agency in Hanoi!

Open bus terrible to say the least. We have booked the Halong bay tour and open bus tickets at Lily travel during our time in Hanoi. We had firstly good tour to Halong bay and we thought that we also have great exprience for the trip down south of Vietnam that is so called as open bus tickets. We have paid $75 bucks for 6 stop open bus which should be just half price if we hadnt traveled at Tet holidays. The point here is, we accepted to pay double price for the open bus to make sure that we have tickets during the crazy time in Vietnam ( Tet holiday) and for many times we asked the lady if we can do the open bus and if we can have spaces on the bus for sure and she said " sure, sure..." and then we booked the bus without knowing that we would have nightmare ahead. The first stop was in Hue. For the beginning of the trip, we had spaces but the bus stopped many times to get the new customers and many people had to lie down on the floor and we feel that there was almost no air in the bus anymore. We couldnt go to the toilet even it is mentioned to be available. The bus driver was very rude and continued to gathering the new customers. It took us 15 hours from Hanoi to Hue which was supposed just to be 12 hours. The really nightmare was on the trip from Hoian to Nha trang. We confirmed the bus 2 days before but lastly we didnt have any spaces on the bus and they said we had to wait for 2 more days for the next bus. Our visas running out and we have to take the local bus instead of and we had to pay $30 more for that even we paid for the open bus. Excellent price. We were showed and explained the differences in the Halong Bay boats and we got and excellent tour for the cheapest price between everyone that was in the boat!!Definitely recommend you book your tour with this agency!

Sapa, Ninh Binh, Ha Long Bay. Over the past 1,5 years I have spent a couple of months in Hanoi and have done a few trips through Lily. Excellent people working there. I sent several emails to ask for information and all of them were answered quick and with useful information.Although my hotel were far away from this agency, when we arrived in Hanoi we did not hesitate to go here in order to contract a tour, because they were very nice to us.Afterward they continued being very professional Lily and her assistant.I do recommend this place, very honest and trustworthy people.

Lily is the best.. Accommodating, informative and all-around the nicest person in Hanoi. She helped us schedule tours to Sapa, Halong Bay and Hoa Lu. She made great recommendations for each of our trips. Her staff was helpful and was always ready to make a phone call if necessary. Definitely travel with Lily.

Lily is more than a travel agent! . I used Lily's services a month and a half ago. I booked 2 tours and an open bus ticket through her agency. Both tours (sapa 3 days 2 nights and Halong Bay 2 days 1 night) were completely as described and noticeably on the cheaper side of price quotes in Hanoi travel agencies (and I did cross check). Apart from accurate good deals, Lily made my traveling in Vietnam and especially Hanoi, feeling very secure. When you roam the streets of Hanoi, you instantly find yourself struggling through tons of business offers regarding your trip, from food stands, through transportation to high end packages and accommodation. You will surely get ripped off. Not at Lily's. When you sit in her welcoming office you feel it almost on the spot. You read her moto "Trust is south more than gold" and you know you're in for hands. She and her caring staff are some of friendliest people I met in Vietnam, always looking after you, offering you help and making you feel at home. I remember 2 events that made the service from Lily that special:1. After visiting Sapa I came to her and felt sick that day with a sore throat. When Lily heard, she immediately when on to find a relief for me, ending up buying me some tablets to ease the pain! 2. Lily gives you her phone number to contact her in case of a problem, and I did have one, only it was in 6am, and I was in Nha Trang, hundreds of kilometers away from her agency. She didn't care about the hour, and helped me on the spot. It was really beautiful to experience.I highly recommend Lily's travel agency to anyone who goes in and around Hanoi.

Amazing experience in Sapa with the best tour guide - Mao!!. I do not have words to describe how beautiful was this trip. Mao, our tour guide, was amazing, simple amazing. She was so kind and friendly all the time. We really enjoyed all the time we spent with her. She was so knowledge about so many things, it was just a pleasure to be with her. She is completely fluent in English and she even know many words in Spanish. She took us to magical places and she knew exactly the best places to go to see the rice fields. She was on time and she was waiting for us at the lobby. The lunch was very good. We stopped at a very small village and we ate at a local restaurant, which was very nice! I really recommend her as your tour guide in Sapa. Lily's, our tour agent, was very helpful all the time. She provided me with all the information that I needed for my trip including recommendations on what villages to go. She replied to my messages very fast. I really recommend her company to book tours and if you are visiting Sapa ASK for MAO! :) She is the best! Visited January 11-12, 2016

Great customer service. We have read really great feedbacks on Lilytravels agency and decided to ask for advice regarding our trip in Halong Bay. Lily is a really nice and professional person. She called the cruises, which interested us to check some information for us and was able to book for us just the evening before departure! She also explained us in details how the trip will be organized and has invited us to call her if we encounter any issues.

Awesome homestay in Sapa at Lily´s Family. Me and my friend made a great expierence with this travel agency. We booked a 5 day tour(3 day hiking, 2 nights homestay, 2 nights nightbus) to Sapa for trekking through the rice terraces. We went over night with the nightbus from Hanoi to Sapa. Early in the morning we arrived and the girl who guided us picked us up from the station to have some breakfast. It was also possible to leave the luggage there and only take a daypack (One of the family members brought it up to the homestay). While hiking it was possible to ask lots of questions about their culture and their way of living. What I liked the most was that we always had the chance to decide how we wanna hike: easy, medium, difficult or less touristic, more touristic. Nevertheless it is really helpful to have proper hiking shoes, espacially when it was raining. During the night we stayed at the homestay with the family. It was a really nice one. We felt really welcome. I always have the sentence in my head the woman said: "When there is no one sleeping here, it is boring!" Not to forget their food was awesome (especially the Springrolls, after two weeks of Vietnam still the best!). After dinner we played some funny drinking games with them and lots of homemade ricewine ( also called as "Happy Water"). This is why i absolutely can recomend this agency to book a tour there!!!
Perfect. Discovered this agency in TripAdvisor and everything was perfect. We booked Sapa with Mao and a Halong Bay boat trip with Legacy cruises. Very professional and great and friendly staff!

Easy to book through and good value. We read about Lily on tripadvisor and got good help with our booking. We had several options and she talked us through our different choices.We went to Halong bay on a two days one night cruise. The trip was nice and the only complaint is that we had delays on both the trip out and the trip home for about on hour each.

Excellent Service - great experience. We travelled Vietnam in December 2015 and came across Lily's on our search for a place to book a Halong bay tour. Lily's had been recommended on a blog I had read about where to best book the tour. Unlike most other travel agency's (including the hotel we stayed in) lily did not try to hard sell us a tour but took her time to show us all the available options at very reasonable prices. We booked the monkey island tour and were very happy. We also booked our overnight bus from Hanoi to Hue at Lily's and everything worked just fine. I would recommend Lily's to anyone who wants to book any kind of tour. It was a great and pleasant experience.

Ha Long Bay & Homestay in Sapa. As we had only 4 weeks for Southeast Asia and wanted to spent 2 weeks in Laos we looked for an option to see at least some parts of northern Vietnam.Lily's agency offered the best package that included a three day trip for Ha Long Bay (however instead of staying in a hotel the second night in hindsight we would have taken the bungalow on monkey island instead) and a two day trekking tour with one Homestay night in Sapa.They also took care of all travel arrangements (Hanoi - Ha Long Bay - Hanoi - Sapa (by night train) - Dien Bien Phu (where we crossed the border to Laos).In total we can't complain about arrangements and service the only downside was the second night of the Ha Long Bay Trip. The hotel in Cat Ba is ok, rooms are spacious but the town is nothing special at all the bungalow option on a rather lonely island seems to be the way better option for a couple. Pure nature and direct access to the sea. So we have been told the hotel would be the more comfortable way, but the bungalow is the more romantic and will longer be remembered as our fellow traveler told us who opted for the bungalow.So in total 4 out of 5 stars!

Excellent!. Lily is great!1. Had a long conversation with her over email back from Germany and she was very patient and very helpful! 2. But as we heared they do refurbishment now, and its time for that. I rarely give excellent reviews but Lily is super!

Excellent. Lily is really great. She is so friendly and welcoming and she speaks wonderful english. She organised our trip to Halong Bay and gave us a price that could not be beaten. It was always a pleasure for us to drop by her office to chat for a while or get a piece of advice. She also exchanged some USD to VND at the best rate that we found in Vietnam, much better than the jellewry shops. She is highly recommended - just go and see for yourselves.

Best travel agency ever!. This is the best and most professional travel agency I have ever had a chance to use. They organized a great trip to Ha Long Bay for us -gave us all information, and advised to find the best option - good value for money. Also we use them to book the bus to Sapa and Vientiane. Lily is great - she is very helpful, gives you all help you need and is a very friendly person. If you are looking for a professional and kind service this is the best choice!

Very well impressed by Lily's Travel Agency service. Found this travel agency through TripAdvisor reviews and with many emails we booked with them transportation from/ to Airport and 2 tours . For Halong Bay and Hoa Lu one day trips was enjoyable.Lily is very energetic providing all the information you need about the city

Excellent and commitment agency . Found this travel agency through TripAdvisor and with many emails we booked 2 tours with them. We were promptly pick up by their private car to our hotel.
