Our trip to Tam Coa Hoa Lu was enjoyable.There was no delay even in picking us up to the airport for our departure. Our trip to Hanoi was fun and enjoyable with Lily Travel who ensure that our requirements were met.
Best Agency. Well organized, excelente people, cheapest agency and extremely helpful. Lily is awesome! They are the best for sure. Thank you for all.

A reliable agency in Hanoi!. We contacted this agency by e-mail after a friend recommendation. Totally blown away but her hospitality . Prior booking to Lily's Travel agency, I did an extensive research to scout for a reliable travel agency to assist me and my 4 buddies to book a 3d2n cruise and sleeper train tickets to Danang. Super helpful, very friendly. A few friends and I were staying at a hostel nearby and found Lily's Travel Agency to be a very convenient and helpful stop to make during our visit to Hanoi. Fantastic Hospitality. My wife found Lily's Travel Agency online after going through some reviews and we decided to meet her in person. Great!. We booked a 2 day/1 night Cruise through Lily and she also booked traintickets for us! We recommend Lily's travel agency!Sari & Torkel

Just Amazing!!. Lily and her staff were simple amazing. Besides giving you food and water, she helps in everything. The best travel agency in hanoi. Me and my friends went to lily's agency after to have checked out a lot of agency in hanoi city. 2 Days 1 Night trip to Halong Bay (Cruise). Traveling to a foreign country with language you can't understand will make you paranoid at all things. You can trust. Fantastic!!. Lily's travel agency is amazing! We found it from all the excellent reviews on trip adviser and Facebook, and they weren't wrong!! The best travel agency so far! . I have read a few good blogs and reviews which stated that Lily is 1 of the best travel agency in Hanoi. Trip to Sapa A+. Lily was wonderful. Halong bay, overnight bus and flights. The good reviews on trip advisor have got it right, Lily and her team were incredibly welcoming and helpful, with good English. They helped us choose a tour and travel which we have been very happy with, and at great prices. Cannot recommend her more.

Lilly for president!. We visited several travel agents before we came to Lilly's. Greetings from the customers with the nice hands ;-)

Amazing service and advice. Sapa local guide hiking tour,3. Ha Long Bay 1 night/ 2 day tour,4. a local Hanoi cooking course and;5. 1 night accommodation in their adjoining 'See U at Lilly's' Backpacker Hotel roomsWe don't have room to review each component here, but everything they booked exceeded expectations and we consider ourselves seasoned travellers.Thanks so much again Lilly, Stu and freindly staff for the amazing experiences!We can't wait to use you again! :)

Friendly, helpful, responsive. All you want from a travel agency.. I booked a Halong bay cruise and the open bus ticket through Lily's Travel Agency. They speak well English and are really helpful, they will answer any question you might have about your stay in Vietnam. The Halong Bay Cruise was OK, everything was as advertised. If you're not too tall, the bus is comfortable enough and you get some sleep, the roads have been redone recently so no problem with that. Regarding the prices I think they are really OK too. I'm not a good bargainer and still think I got a decent deal.You can reach the agency through whatsapp as well, which was very convenient for me to confirm when I would want to take the bus.

Excellent service. Booked our 3day/2night trip to halong Bay with lily and couldn't have been happier. Trip was as described and we even got upgraded to a nicer cruise ship on the day. Also booked overnight train to Hue here and lily let us leave our bags in the shop as we had a few hours to kill before leaving Hanoi. Also recieved complimentary bottles of water every time we called to the shop. Which was three times in total. Would definitely recommend this place.

Well organised and very helpful. I went here on a recommendation from a friend and was very pleased with the service. She gave me her contact details and said to borrow the guide's phone should I have any problems and need to contact her (which I didn't). Thumbs up from me!!

The sign says all.. Lily is such a nice person. The agency has a sign that says: "Trust is most valuable than gold". That´s Lily, someone you can trust. And she is absolutly honest about everything, even when she talk about the pictures in brochures, that are always better than the reality. We saw better prices in signs around Hanoi, but I doubt they do what Lily does: sell exactly what she offer. Thank you Lily!

Lily is great, tours are fab.. Great place to book tours. Prices are competitive and staff are lovely. I had some issues with my bus and lily sorted everything out as soon as she was aware. Great service.

Friendly and Generous team. Before we book any travel agency to go to Ha Long Bay in vietnam, I and my friends did some research about the cruise and the travel agency. Great place to book your tour(s). Lily and her staff take the time to answer all of your questions and find the tour that suits you and your budget most. Very friendly and efficient. We booked two tours through Lily's and were thrilled with the service we received. INCREDIBLE WOMAN. After reading all the reviews from Lily's Agency we decided to go, haven't regret! Booked couple of trips Sa Pa and Halong Bay. Amazing value. We booked a trip to Halong Bay (3 days/2 nights) via Lily's Travel Agency. Our experience was fantastic. Thank-you Lily !!!!. Lily's Travel Agency was an outstanding help for me in Hanoi. They can plan for any budget and help organize your valuable time in the Hanoi and surrounding area. If you want something changed, Lily will discuss and adjust accordingly - she does not push you into anything. She also will store your luggage in case you want to do an overnight trip and return later for your bag.... AND can use restrooms as needed.She is very friendly and her staff is great. Always time to chat, provides bottled waters, and sometimes food if she has extra. You can use her office to wait between tours, recharge your electronics, and just hang out. What a great experience with Lily!!!! Really a friendly person and outstanding service.She really made my first days in Vietnam perfect.

Lily the angel. I had read about Lily through online posts and had to check it out. I was traveling alone but went to Lilys with 3 other friends I had met along the way. Great service and friendly staff. After reading the great reviews on Lily Travel, we decided to book our day trips to Ha Long Bay and Hua Lu & Tam Coc with them. Excellent and friendly advice. I spoke to Lilly regarding a Halong bay cruise. She recommended Fantasea as a mid range cruise and reassured me it boat would be the same as booked. The tour itself was great and I found Lily to be very friendly.

Honest and friendly service. The staff here were so friendly, helpful and honest! Amazing and honest travel agent. I cannot recommend Lily's travel agency enough. Lily and her staff were very honest and helpful. awesome help!. went to viet in may 2015. lily was extremely helpful. i booked Sapa tour and a halong bay tour from Lily. Reasonable pricing. super helpful. good english. very friendly. ever available over e-mail and whatsapp if you need help. thanks for making my Hanoi experience so awesome!

The most honest business in Vietnam - lovely to work with!. My husband and I just had a perfect experience with Lily and her crew! After being in Hanoi for a few days and getting scammed left and right by various people, we were wary of using a travel agency to book our trip to Halong Bay. My research of reputable travel agencies online led me to Lily's, and I'm so happy to say that all of the rave reviews of this agency are accurate. Lily and her team are kind, welcoming, and honest. They give you useful information and careful explain your options, as many times as you ask, and do not pressure you to buy or book anything. We visited Lily's a few times. The first time, we went to gather information about the many tour companies in Halong Bay and told Van that we would go back to our hotel to think about our options and come back later to potentially book something. We expected her to try to pressure us to book then and there, give us the "I have a special price for you" pitch, but she gave us a genuine smile and said "Ok, no problem! There is much to consider!" It was so nice to be able to take our time with our decision. We went back the next day and booked our lovely tour (with Fantasea Cruise) with Lily herself. The package we booked was exactly as she had described, and the price was right. The third time we went back to Lily's was just to ask a question about the best way to get from the De Nang train station into Hoi An. The team at Lily's had earned our trust and we felt we would get reliable information. To our delight, they did not try to sell us a package or tickets to anything, but merely suggested that we hire a taxi when we arrive in De Nang, gave us a guideline for how much it should cost, and recommended that we try to share a taxi with another couple on our train. How refreshing to not have someone trying to take advantage of us, and just being helpful!Thank you, Lily's, for your excellent help!

Halong Bay Experience at its Finest!. I am grateful to have found this travel agency, not only that they are quick to respond but they are really accommodating. Friendly and honest help. This travel agency is by far the most popular in the street and not without a reason. Excellent Service!. I am so grateful I went to Lily's. I looked around for hours to find a Halong Bay tour but after seeing reviews for Lily's online I went straight there. Excellent service. Anyone looking for a reliable tour agency in Hanoi Old Quarter should visit Lily's Travel agency. They were so helpful and trustworthy that they made our trip so enjoyable. Look for Lily and she will make you feel so at home in Hanoi.

This women is so good you'll want to marry her! . So my boyfriend and his friend Matthew used Lily's agency to book a trip to Halong Bay and some trains around Vietnam. Couldn't be better!!!. Will come back next time!. We used Lily's Travel Agency three times when we were in Hanoi. Best travel agent you'll ever find in Hanoi.. Wow, I don't even know where to begin. We've heard so many good things about Lily and her agency, and she proved them all right. Bad experience. I was warmly invited into the shop where Mrs Lily who speaks good english help me to get the right tour within my budget. I was supposed to reach the shop at 8am and the shop was closed when I arrived on time. It wasn't until I called Lily a few times before she pick up and she assured me that the tour guide will wait for me. She arrived at 8.10am, the same time the tour guide reached, just in time for me to put down my bags in Lily's shop and leave.When I was back from my Halong Bay tour, I was preparing to pick up my bags, take a quick shower and catch a night bus to Sapa at 9.45pm. But to my horror, the shop was closed, this was at 8.50pm, and I gave Lily a few phone calls, but she never pick them up but instead she dismissed my call. I knocked on the gates, but the family do not want to open the door and they couldn't understand me. After a help from a lady working at the opposite shop to do some translation, the family made a call to Lily, and she instantly picked up the call. I told Lily that my bag was in her shop, she just said "ohh~" and asked me to pass the phone back to them. This was when the gate finally opened, and it was 9.30pm. I went through 40 minutes in panic state just to get my bags. What if I missed my bus? I think Lily certainly does not care about it, but will be more than willing to book another trip for you, you pay. She is an example of those irresponsible tour agency that solely wants your money and when the deal's done, you are left on your own.

Couldn't have been more helpful, informative and honest!. As you can already tell by her tripadvisor reviews, Lily is a real professional at what she does and is way beyond the leagues of many other travel agencies that will overcharge you, rip you off taking advantage of the fact you are a foreigner. We did a 2 day 1 night tour in Bai Tu Long Bay and for this we were given a really great price, a lot of information and we definitely weren't pressured into choosing one option. Also, I told her that I was going to be living in Hanoi and 2 minutes later she called a friend of hers' who later met me to discuss possible employment.A few days after our trip to Bai Tu Long Bay we also wanted to go to a place called Dam Long. So in the end, at no cost at all she sat us down for half an hour and informed us as to how we could manage to get a bus there. She organised this, gave us a really great price and in an hour had someone waiting at the front of our hotel to take us where we wanted to go.In the end, Hanoi, like so many places in the world, has a booming tourism industry. This means it can be very difficult to attain honest information and most importantly, a good price and a great experience. After my friend and I's experience with Lily, I can definitely assure that you will get peace of mind organising your travels with her!Thanks so much Lily!Dylan & Lau

A very good professional¡. Has been a pleasure meet Mrs. Lilly. She speaks english very well and explain everything in a very understandable and helpful way. Travels well prepared and managed. Quick Solutions¡

Great Service! . We decided to look for Lily because of all the good reviews on here and weren't disappointed! Friendly, Trustworthy, and Caring!. Both Lily and Van were great help when booking our trip to Ha Long Bay! They also looked up various modes of transportation and helped us book our trip back to Bangkok. We appreciate all the help and great customer service! Thanks so much! - Ashley & Courtney

Extremely helpful. Sweet place to score a deal for Halong Bay cruises! Very nice girl owns it - Lily, and speaks awesome English! Almost committed the ultimate travel faux-pas and booked via our hotel, but SO glad I came here. Swing by and have a chat.

We loved lily and her tours!!. We booked three tours with lily and loved them all! She was so nice and went out of her way to be helpful and accommodating. Great tours, not so great hotel recommendation. I used Lily's Travel Agency for 3 services during my stay in Hanoi: a trip to Halong Bay, a trip to Mai Chau Valley and a hotel recommendation between the two trips. In short: The tours were really good, but the hotel (which supposedly is run by Lily's friend) pulled the most classic "Hanoi Hotel Scam" on me, which was very annoying. I'll explain it later.First of all, the trip to Halong Bay was very nice. It was not the exact trip as I was promised, different ship and different itinerary. I think this is just something you have to suck up if you order through an agent. Even if they tell you what to expect about the trip, it's hard for them to control, since they don't operate the tours themselves. I really enjoyed the trip and I believe I got a really good deal. Even though the ship was very old, it was still very nice, clean and had a great staff, that were not too pushy.Second of all, the trip to Mai Chau Valley was really nice as well. I really recommend it. This was the highlight of my week in Vietnam. The tour was really well organised and the deal I got from Lily was very good. Actually, other people on the trip paid almost 70 % (!!!) more for the trip than I paid Lily! So watch out if you go somewhere else.Finally, there was the hotel I was recommended between my stays. Lily's "friend" showed me a really nice room that I reserved for when I returned back from Halong Bay. I instinctively knew that it would happen and it did. When I got back, they pulled the classical Hanoi hotel scam, which was really annoying. The scam is so common in Hanoi. It works like this: The hotel will sell you a really nice deal, either online or IRL. When you show up to check in, they will tell you a lie about why they had to move you to their "sister" hotel or whatever. In my case they told me a story about someone who was sick in the room. It was so obvious what was going on. As I was tired after the trip and didn't want to walk around to find another place (they know this is always the case) I accepted the horrible room they gave me in another hotel, but I truly regret it. I regret giving the scammers my money. Anyways. It's impossible for me to know if Lily knows about how this works, but it's hard for me to believe that she never heard about it. If she wants to keep these good reviews and not disappoint her customers, I would suggest that she talks with her friend and explains that this is not acceptable, before sending more people to their hotel.I was really happy about the trips, especially when I realised how good a deal I got, but I can't give a 5 star rating because of the annoying hotel scam that they pulled on me. Come on. We have the internet now and we all know about this!
